texts: There are many tiny seeds living in our land.
In Timor-Leste, there are special and beautiful seeds breathing quietly.
Every seed needs our care to grow strong.
Give them warm sunlight, clean water, and lots of love.
Then, the little seeds will grow into delicious vegetables and fruits.
Some become green vegetables, some become red fruits, and some become yellow grains.
Some seeds bloom into wonderful flowers, and some become big trees.
Thanks to these many plants, we can enjoy healthy and tasty food.
Every day, we taste new flavors and get the strength to grow healthy.
If we lose these precious seeds, we will have less food to eat.
It is very important that many kinds of life live together around us.
Letâ€™s all protect and take care of these precious seeds.
Then our world will become even healthier and richer.
